law.catch_line: The only employees of the St. Mary's Nursing Center, Inc. who are eligible to participate in the emp...
law.text: The only employees of the St. Mary's Nursing Center, Inc. who are eligible to participate in the employees' systems under this subtitle are those employees who were members of the Employees' Retirement System or the Employees' Pension System as employees of the St. Mary's County Nursing Home on January 17, 1996.
